goal: Populate Languages on character.Data during Finalize - ensure languages serialize and deserialize correctly

sessions.notes: Explored codebase. Found: compileLanguages() works correctly, ToData() has TODO and doesn't serialize languages, LoadFromData() doesn't restore languages field

sessions.task: Fix ToData() to include languages and LoadFromData() to restore them
sessions.notes: Updated ToData() to copy languages slice instead of TODO comment. Updated LoadFromData() to restore languages field. Added comprehensive test suite covering Human, Elf, Dwarf, Half-Elf language scenarios plus round-trip serialization.
